column5: Hi all, Cat's are biting like crazy lately and I always filet the ones I keep because I have never been shown how to clean them the quick way. Does anyone have a link to a video for cleaning these guys?? Any help would be appreciated. Thanks, Ryan

Edit: If you cant see the videos in this post, then here are the direct links....

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bqCoph-C6Jo&eurl=

Here's a video I found....
Cliff I dont see a video,I see the red X.lol   Nail in the head and cut the skin behind the head and rip the skin off with a pair of plyers.  or this way..  catfish
Hmmm...I can see them here...I'll edit and post the direct links too.  Thanks for the heads up!  Cliff
Thanks guys, Brian, I need to know how to get the skin off quick b'fore I filet it, Thanks for post though, Ryan

I fllet quite a few catfiah a year and was taught ot pull the skin off with pliers.I have since figured out it is much easier to filet them like and other fish just use a knife to remove the skin like you would a bass or walleye. Joe
What fun is there in that Joe.LOL  Never felited one before,guess I,ll give it a go.  BTW,Zehrs had a great cajun cat filet ,already for the fry pan.

I got the easiest way in the world to clean catfish. First you drop Joe off on an island because he has to pee. Then float the cooler of fish over to him and tell him you wont pick him up till they are clean. Works every time. I now have to beat him to the truck though other wise he charges me $20.00 for a ride home....   Art
Clean a cat fish??????? I thought thats what the wife was fer??? ------    Cleanin & cookin.    I'm going to be killed now.    Good knowin ya.
Just ate em' Boy were they good!!!!, Got a hair ball after though!
